title: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
description: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
OB: When selecting line 22, there are 5 joinpoints visible in the cross reference view (should only be 3). When selecting line 68, there are no joinpoints shown (should be 2 here). Right-clicking the marker at line 68 and selecting "advises" displays all 5 joinpoints.
EB: The cross reference view should only display the relevant joinpoints for the selected advice. When selecting a specific joinpoint, there should not be a mix-up or missing joinpoints.
SR:
1. Open the attached project and perform a clean compile.
2. Open the cross reference view.
3. Select line 22 and note the presence of 5 joinpoints (should only be 3)
4. Select line 68 and observe the absence of joinpoints (should be 2 here)
5. Right-click the marker at line 68 and choose "advises" to see all 5 joinpoints.
6. Right-click the marker at line 22 and choose "advises" to see all 5 joinpoints.
